name: LD51 - ShortDay Survive
description:
• You’re stuck in a place where you only have 10 seconds of each day.
  • Whenever night falls, monsters will fall from the sky.
  • Shop items are refreshed every day.
  • How many days can you survive?

Controls

  • WSAD/Arrow Keys: move

Credits

  • Almost all graphic sprites are from here: https://itch.io/s/45421/minifantasy-complete-bundle. So I quit the rating of graphics.

LDJAM Page

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/shortday-survive
